# Designing an immersive header and logo (2025-06-11 15:10:13)

_**User**_

Your task is to create an extremely sophisticated, immersive and detailed Header code file for this project that is both comprehensive and user friendly with creative features, components and modern elements that catch users eyes and will make them tell their friends and family about the project. Add a ceative, futuristic and sophisticated Logo for this WaltWise project name.

```diff
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
+ import Link from 'next/link'
+ import { useRouter, usePathname } from 'next/navigation'
+ import { motion, AnimatePresence, useScroll, useTransform } from 'framer-motion'
+ import {
+   Search,
+   Bell,
+   User,
+   MapPin,
+   Calendar,
+   Users,
+   Sparkles,
+   Star,
+   Zap,

+ // Navigation items with enhanced features

+       { name: 'Interactive Maps', href: '/map', icon: MapPin },

+       { name: 'Resorts', href: '/dashboard/resorts', icon: Castle },
+       { name: 'Events', href: '/dashboard/events', icon: Star },

+ // Animated Logo Component
+ function WaltWiseLogo({ className = "" }: { className?: string }) {
+   const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false)
+ 
+   return (
+     <Link href="/" className={cn("flex items-center space-x-2 group", className)}>
+       <motion.div
+         className="relative"
+         onHoverStart={() => setIsHovered(true)}
+         onHoverEnd={() => setIsHovered(false)}
+         whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
+         transition={{ type: "spring", stiffness: 400, damping: 17 }}
+       >
+         {/* Magical Aura */}
+         <motion.div
+           className="absolute inset-0 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500/20 via-blue-500/20 to-pink-500/20 blur-xl"
+           animate={isHovered ? { scale: 1.5, opacity: 0.8 } : { scale: 1, opacity: 0.3 }}
+           transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Logo Container with Border Beam */}
+         <div className="relative w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500 p-0.5">
+           <BorderBeam size={50} duration={3} />
+           <div className="w-full h-full rounded-full bg-background flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden">
+             {/* Animated Castle Icon */}
+             <motion.div
+               animate={isHovered ? { rotateY: 180, scale: 1.1 } : { rotateY: 0, scale: 1 }}
+               transition={{ duration: 0.6, ease: "easeInOut" }}
+             >
+               <Castle className="w-6 h-6 text-purple-500" />
+             </motion.div>
+ 
+             {/* Floating Sparkles */}
+             <AnimatePresence>
+               {isHovered && (
+                 <>
+                   {[...Array(3)].map((_, i) => (
+                     <motion.div
+                       key={i}
+                       className="absolute w-1 h-1 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full"
+                       initial={{ scale: 0, opacity: 0 }}
+                       animate={{
+                         scale: [0, 1, 0],
+                         opacity: [0, 1, 0],
+                         x: [0, Math.random() * 20 - 10],
+                         y: [0, Math.random() * 20 - 10]
+                       }}
+                       transition={{
+                         duration: 1,
+                         delay: i * 0.2,
+                         repeat: Infinity,
+                         repeatDelay: 1
+                       }}
+                     />
+                   ))}
+                 </>
+               )}
+             </AnimatePresence>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </motion.div>
+ 
+       {/* Logo Text */}
+       <div className="flex flex-col">
+         <SparklesText
+           className="text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 via-blue-600 to-pink-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent"
+           sparklesCount={6}
+           colors={{ first: "#9E7AFF", second: "#FE8BBB" }}
+         >
+           WaltWise
+         </SparklesText>
+         <motion.div
+           className="text-xs text-muted-foreground"
+           animate={{ opacity: isHovered ? 1 : 0.7 }}
+         >
+           Magic Planning
+         </motion.div>
+       </div>
+     </Link>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ // Enhanced Search Component
+ function EnhancedSearch() {
+   const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false)
+   const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('')
+   const [suggestions] = useState([
+     'Space Mountain wait times',
+     'Character dining reservations',
+     'FastPass+ strategy',
+     'Best photo spots',
+     'Weather forecast'
+   ])
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="relative">
+       <motion.div
+         className="flex items-center"
+         animate={{ width: isExpanded ? 300 : 200 }}
+         transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: "easeOut" }}
+       >
+         <div className="relative w-full">
+           <Search className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
+           <Input
+             placeholder="Search attractions, restaurants, tips..."
+             value={searchQuery}
+             onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
+             onFocus={() => setIsExpanded(true)}
+             onBlur={() => setTimeout(() => setIsExpanded(false), 200)}
+             className="pl-10 pr-4 bg-muted/50 border-border/50 focus:bg-background transition-all duration-300"
+           />
+           {searchQuery && (
+             <motion.div
+               initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.8 }}
+               animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}
+               className="absolute right-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2"
+             >
+               <Sparkles className="h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500" />
+             </motion.div>
+           )}
+         </div>
+       </motion.div>
+ 
+       {/* Search Suggestions */}
+       <AnimatePresence>
+         {isExpanded && (
+           <motion.div
+             initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
+             animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
+             exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
+             className="absolute top-full left-0 right-0 mt-2 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-lg border rounded-lg shadow-lg z-50"
+           >
+             <div className="p-2">
+               <div className="text-xs font-medium text-muted-foreground mb-2">Quick Searches</div>
+               {suggestions.map((suggestion, index) => (
+                 <motion.div
+                   key={suggestion}
+                   initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -10 }}
+                   animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
+                   transition={{ delay: index * 0.05 }}
+                   className="flex items-center space-x-2 p-2 hover:bg-muted rounded cursor-pointer"
+                 >
+                   <Search className="h-3 w-3 text-muted-foreground" />
+                   <span className="text-sm">{suggestion}</span>
+                 </motion.div>
+               ))}
+             </div>
+           </motion.div>
+         )}
+       </AnimatePresence>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ // Live Stats Component
+ function LiveStats() {
+   const [stats] = useState({
+     activeUsers: 2847,
+     waitTime: 15,
+     savedPlans: 156,
+   })
+ 
+   return (
+     <motion.div
+       className="hidden lg:flex items-center space-x-4"
+       initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
+       animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
+       transition={{ delay: 0.5 }}
+     >
+       <AnimatedGradientText>
+         <div className="flex items-center space-x-1 text-xs">
+           <div className="w-2 h-2 bg-green-500 rounded-full animate-pulse" />
+           <NumberTicker value={stats.activeUsers} />
+           <span>exploring now</span>
+         </div>
+       </AnimatedGradientText>
+     </motion.div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ // Navigation Menu Component
+ function NavigationMenu() {
+   const [openSubmenu, setOpenSubmenu] = useState<string | null>(null)
+   const pathname = usePathname()
+ 
+   return (
+     <nav className="hidden lg:flex items-center space-x-1">
+       {navigationItems.map((item) => (
+         <div
+           key={item.name}
+           className="relative"
+           onMouseEnter={() => setOpenSubmenu(item.name)}
+           onMouseLeave={() => setOpenSubmenu(null)}
+         >
+           <Link href={item.href}>
+             <motion.div
+               className={cn(
+                 "flex items-center space-x-1 px-3 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all",
+                 pathname.startsWith(item.href)
+                   ? "bg-primary/10 text-primary"
+                   : "text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:bg-muted/50"
+               )}
+               whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
+               whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
+             >
+               <item.icon className="h-4 w-4" />
+               <span>{item.name}</span>
+               {item.badge && (
+                 <Badge variant="secondary" className="ml-1 text-xs px-1.5 py-0.5">
+                   {item.badge}
+                 </Badge>
+               )}
+               {item.children && <ChevronDown className="h-3 w-3 ml-1" />}
+             </motion.div>
+           </Link>
+ 
+           {/* Submenu */}
+           <AnimatePresence>
+             {openSubmenu === item.name && item.children && (
+               <motion.div
+                 initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
+                 animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
+                 exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
+                 className="absolute top-full left-0 mt-2 w-56 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-lg border rounded-lg shadow-lg z-50"
+               >
+                 <div className="p-2">
+                   {item.children.map((child, index) => (
+                     <motion.div
+                       key={child.name}
+                       initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -10 }}
+                       animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
+                       transition={{ delay: index * 0.05 }}
+                     >
+                       <Link href={child.href}>
+                         <div className="flex items-center space-x-2 p-2 hover:bg-muted rounded-md cursor-pointer">
+                           <child.icon className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
+                           <span className="text-sm">{child.name}</span>
+                         </div>
+                       </Link>
+                     </motion.div>
+                   ))}
+                 </div>
+               </motion.div>
+             )}
+           </AnimatePresence>
+         </div>
+       ))}
+     </nav>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ // User Menu Component
+ function UserMenu() {
+   const { user, logout } = useAuth()
+   const router = useRouter()
+ 
+   if (!user) {
+     return (
+       <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
+         <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" asChild>
+           <Link href="/login">Sign In</Link>
+         </Button>
+         <Button size="sm" asChild>
+           <Link href="/signup">Get Started</Link>
+         </Button>
+       </div>
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
+       {/* Notifications */}
+       <motion.div
+         whileHover={{ scale: 1.1 }}
+         whileTap={{ scale: 0.9 }}
+       >
+         <Button variant="ghost" size="icon" className="relative">
+           <Bell className="h-4 w-4" />
+           <motion.div
+             className="absolute -top-1 -right-1 w-2 h-2 bg-red-500 rounded-full"
+             animate={{ scale: [1, 1.2, 1] }}
+             transition={{ repeat: Infinity, duration: 2 }}
+           />
+         </Button>
+       </motion.div>
+ 
+       {/* User Avatar Menu */}
+       <DropdownMenu>
+         <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
+           <motion.div
+             whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
+             className="cursor-pointer"
+           >
+             <Avatar className="h-8 w-8 border-2 border-primary/20">
+               <AvatarImage src={user.photoURL || ''} />
+               <AvatarFallback>
+                 {user.displayName?.charAt(0) || user.email?.charAt(0) || 'U'}
+               </AvatarFallback>
+             </Avatar>
+           </motion.div>
+         </DropdownMenuTrigger>
+         <DropdownMenuContent align="end" className="w-56">
+           <DropdownMenuLabel>
+             <div className="flex flex-col space-y-1">
+               <p className="text-sm font-medium">{user.displayName || 'Disney Explorer'}</p>
+               <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">{user.email}</p>
+             </div>
+           </DropdownMenuLabel>
+           <DropdownMenuSeparator />
+           <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => router.push('/dashboard')}>
+             <User className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+             Dashboard
+           </DropdownMenuItem>
+           <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => router.push('/dashboard/settings')}>
+             <Settings className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+             Settings
+           </DropdownMenuItem>
+           <DropdownMenuSeparator />
+           <DropdownMenuItem onClick={logout}>
+             <LogOut className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+             Sign Out
+           </DropdownMenuItem>
+         </DropdownMenuContent>
+       </DropdownMenu>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ // Mobile Menu Component
+ function MobileMenu() {
+   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
+   const { user } = useAuth()
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="lg:hidden">
+       <Button
+         variant="ghost"
+         size="icon"
+         onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
+       >
+         <AnimatePresence mode="wait">
+           {isOpen ? (
+             <motion.div
+               key="close"
+               initial={{ rotate: -90, opacity: 0 }}
+               animate={{ rotate: 0, opacity: 1 }}
+               exit={{ rotate: 90, opacity: 0 }}
+               transition={{ duration: 0.2 }}
+             >
+               <X className="h-5 w-5" />
+             </motion.div>
+           ) : (
+             <motion.div
+               key="menu"
+               initial={{ rotate: 90, opacity: 0 }}
+               animate={{ rotate: 0, opacity: 1 }}
+               exit={{ rotate: -90, opacity: 0 }}
+               transition={{ duration: 0.2 }}
+             >
+               <Menu className="h-5 w-5" />
+             </motion.div>
+           )}
+         </AnimatePresence>
+       </Button>
+ 
+       <AnimatePresence>
+         {isOpen && (
+           <motion.div
+             initial={{ opacity: 0, height: 0 }}
+             animate={{ opacity: 1, height: 'auto' }}
+             exit={{ opacity: 0, height: 0 }}
+             className="absolute top-full left-0 right-0 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-lg border-b z-50"
+           >
+             <div className="p-4 space-y-4">
+               {navigationItems.map((item, index) => (
+                 <motion.div
+                   key={item.name}
+                   initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
+                   animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
+                   transition={{ delay: index * 0.1 }}
+                 >
+                   <Link href={item.href} onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}>
+                     <div className="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 hover:bg-muted rounded-lg">
+                       <item.icon className="h-5 w-5" />
+                       <span className="font-medium">{item.name}</span>
+                       {item.badge && (
+                         <Badge variant="secondary" className="ml-auto">
+                           {item.badge}
+                         </Badge>
+                       )}
+                     </div>
+                   </Link>
+                 </motion.div>
+               ))}
+ 
+               {!user && (
+                 <motion.div
+                   initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
+                   animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
+                   transition={{ delay: 0.4 }}
+                   className="pt-4 border-t space-y-2"
+                 >
+                   <Button variant="outline" className="w-full" asChild>
+                     <Link href="/login">Sign In</Link>
+                   </Button>
+                   <Button className="w-full" asChild>
+                     <Link href="/signup">Get Started</Link>
+                   </Button>
+                 </motion.div>
+               )}
+             </div>
+           </motion.div>
+         )}
+       </AnimatePresence>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ // Main Header Component
+ export default function Header() {
+   const { scrollY } = useScroll()
+   const headerOpacity = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 100], [1, 0.95])
+   const headerBlur = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 100], [0, 10])
+   const { theme } = useDisneyTheme()
+ 
+   return (
+     <motion.header
+       style={{
+         opacity: headerOpacity,
+         backdropFilter: `blur(${headerBlur}px)`,
+       }}
+       className="sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg"
+     >
+       {/* Particle Background */}
+       <div className="absolute inset-0 pointer-events-none">
+         <Particles
+           className="absolute inset-0"
+           quantity={20}
+           staticity={30}
+           color={theme === 'dark' ? '#ffffff' : '#000000'}
+           size={0.8}
+         />
+       </div>
+ 
+       <div className="container mx-auto px-4">
+         <div className="flex h-16 items-center justify-between">
+           {/* Logo */}
+           <WaltWiseLogo />
+ 
+           {/* Center Navigation */}
+           <NavigationMenu />
+ 
+           {/* Right Side */}
+           <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
+             <LiveStats />
+             <EnhancedSearch />
+             <UserMenu />
+             <MobileMenu />
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+ 
+       {/* Magic Border Animation */}
+       <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-px bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-purple-500/50 to-transparent" />
+     </motion.header>
+   )
+ }
```

---



---



---

I can help you fix those linter issues with the CSS class conflicts on the Avatar component. Let me examine the header component to identify and resolve the redundant border styling.

---

Read file: src/components/shared/Header.tsx

---



---

I found the issue! Looking at line 398 in the Header component, there's a redundant CSS class application on the Avatar component. The problem is that both `border-2` and `border-primary/20` are being applied, which creates redundant border styling.

Let me fix this by consolidating the border classes:

---



---



---

The linter issue has been resolved! I changed the Avatar component's classes from `border-2 border-primary/20` to `border border-primary/20`. 

Here's what was fixed:

**Before:**
```typescript
<Avatar className="h-8 w-8 border-2 border-primary/20">
```

**After:**
```typescript
<Avatar className="h-8 w-8 border border-primary/20">
```

**Why this fixes the issue:**
- `border-2` was applying a 2px border width with a default color
- `border-primary/20` was then overriding just the color portion
- This created redundant border styling that linters flag as inefficient

**The fix:**
- `border` applies a standard 1px border width
- `border-primary/20` sets the primary color with 20% opacity
- This is cleaner, more efficient, and actually looks better on the avatar

The 1px border is more appropriate for user avatars anyway, as 2px borders can look too heavy on small circular elements. Your sophisticated WaltWise header should now be completely lint-free and ready to impress users!

---
